segments.text: Hello , this is room 1205 . Our message lamp is flashing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry to have kept you waiting . Mr . Johns needs a telephone call from you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you bring the message to my room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid we have nobody available at the moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then I'll come down and pick up the message immediately .
segments.speaker: S1
